message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. Would you be willing to pay $110 for it?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make a living, you know! Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $112?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $113, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm close, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $111?
I'm starting to think we're going to have to agree to disagree, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $112.50, but that's my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to explore other options.
